name: DBFH 2XX7
description:
For the 2017 Desert Bus For Hope game jam, of course.  Save Desert Bus HQ from crashing by getting the most important fuel of all: coffee.  Also question reality, maybe.

It's an RPGmaker game so, arrow keys to move, Z/spacebar to interact, and X for cancel/menu.

(This was my first year watching the stream, so I have no idea who anyone is and am unfamiliar with the memes.  As a result, everyone in the game is horrible knock-offs and only resemble people in appearance, and I'm terrible at remembering people so I can't even try to place names.  Oh, also I joined the jam while it was halfway through.)
